‎

Hi, I'm Switzi !

‎

‎

‎

Don't mind the knife, just waving at you.

‎

‎

‎

‎

‎

‎

Switzi got stuck while getting assembled. You need to help Switzi escape!

But first, you need to get the tools and use them in multiple ways to turn up the heat of this factory so Switzi can escape while the factory is unstable.
